data.title: Obituary of Henry Nash
data.meta_description: Nash Henry - November 2,1934 - April 1 , 2009- Passed peacefully away at St. Clare's Mercy Hospital, St. John's in his 74th year .Predeceased by hi
data.text:
Please share a memory of Henry to include in a keepsake book for family and friends.

Nash Henry - November 2,1934 - April 1 , 2009- Passed peacefully away at St. Clare's Mercy Hospital, St. John's in his 74th year .Predeceased by his wife Lucy (nee Connors), his parents Catherine (Coffey) and Henry Nash, his guardians Aunt Carrie (Nash) and Uncle Edward Brennan, his sister Mary Power and brother Stephen Nash. Leaving to mourn his two daughters: Paulette (Hiroshima, Japan) and Caroline and her fiancé Bill Chaulk (Lewisporte); his sisters Rita Roche of Branch, Teresa Gelinas, St Catherine's, Ontario and Evelyn Dudas, Toronto, Ontario and brother George Nash, Surrey, BC, foster sister Barbara ( Hank Howlett) Athens, Texas; special nephew Jerry( Pauline Power) of Branch; friends Kevin Power, Fred Roche Pat and Jeanette Mooney, a number of other relatives and friends, the caretakers and staff of the Gateway Residence, Dunville. Resting at Coombs Funeral Home, Placentia Sunday, April 5th beginning at 2pm until 9pm. Funeral Mass to take place Monday, April 6th, 2009 at 2 pm at St. Patricks Church, Patricks Cove. Interment to follow in the Roman Catholic Cemetery, Patricks Cove. No flowers by request and donations may be made to: SCHOOL BREAKFAST PROGRAM, FATIMA HIGH SCHOOL, ST. BRIDE'S, P. BAY, NL A0B 2Z0 ( cards will be available at the Funeral Home). You are welcome to visit and sign our online guestbook @ www.coombsfuneralhome.ca
